Summary: the ufo was circular in shape
divs: Sighting Details it was the middle of the night , and i woke up forsome strange reason. i looked out thewindow and saw that there was some thinggoing on and i decieded that i would watch it for a while . my thought that itmight have been an airplane, but but then i did not see any blinking light likeyou would see on an airplane.the object was moving left right and in circles andwould drop things, and when a car or other object would go by, it would stop fora while and then start up again.the object went higher than my window and therefor i could not locate it after that.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in West Hartford
There were no other sightings in West Hartford on or around March 15th 2002
